headline: law enforcement specialist  at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary: I am currently a law enforcement specialist  at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) with an Associate's degree in Criminal Justice. I am a veteran of the the U.S Military where i served for over 8 years in which time I have received numerous accommodations and awards including the Purple Heart,Army Good Conduct Medal, Army Accommodation Medal and Army Achievement Medal. I am Team Oriented, i work well with others and respect the beliefs of others even if they are different from my own. I am at my best and happiest when I am doing for others. I am conscientious and always trying to do the best I can at any job I am given. . knowledge is power, so i am always eager to learn new things. I feel that my best quality is my integrity and my unwavering dedication. My worst quality is that I am a bit talkative at times. I think my biggest accomplishment is the honor of serving with some of the best men and women of the United States Military.

Communicated with village members and leaders, determined localsâ needs, engaged their cooperation and partnership and established relationships. Trained Afghan Army and Police counterparts. positions.title: Calvalry Scout

positions.description: Managed the ship's service facilities, including the ship store, barber shop and laundry operations.  Managed inventory, daily collection and distribution of uniforms and linens for 300 sailors. Safely operated and maintained multiple laundry stations.  Ensured that service facilities conformed to U.S. Navy standards and contributed to high sailor morale.
positions.title: Ship Serviceman

positions.description: Successfully executed 100+Small Boat missions in support of the U.S. Navy's Global Defense Operations, while ensuring the safety of ten crewmembers. Based on leadership and technical skills, the only sailor of 300 selected to serve as Visit, Board, Search and Seizure (VBSS) Coxswain and Reaction Force Leader. Assessed the ship's maintenance and repair needs, delegated assignments and executed action plans, while leading a team of five sailors and significantly improving ship's overall material condition and readiness. Interpreted and executed commands while operating ship's navigation control system to maintain ship's course.
